primary_trope.name: tier_reveal
primary_trope.hook_text: 328 races. 14 dimensions. Where does THE EQUALIZER - Missouri State Championship land?
primary_trope.mechanism: Countdown / ranking — inherent escalation and social comparison.

beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: We gave THE EQUALIZER - Missouri State Championship the verdict: The July Heat Survival Test. Elite tier. 60 out of 100. Let me tell you what that really means.
beats.text_on_screen: THE EQUALIZER - Missouri State Championship: The July Heat Survival Test
beats.visual: Verdict badge slam + tier badge + avatar
beats.editing_note: Open with verdict like a boxing title card. Avatar with villain energy. Music: ominous build. PROMISE the viewer they'll learn the real story.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap + cognitive dissonance (verdict vs expectation).

beats.label: WHAT THEY TELL YOU
beats.narration: Let's start with what they put on the registration page.
beats.visual: Marketing highlights overlay — strengths as bullet points

broll_sources.query: THE EQUALIZER - Missouri State Championship official trailer
THE EQUALIZER - Missouri State Championship promo video

beats.editing_note: Read strengths in an exaggerated 'promotional voice.' Avatar side-eyes camera. Bright, clean visuals — this is the 'too good to be true' section. CONTRAST PATTERN: this calm section sets up the burst at 0:50.

beats.label: WHAT THEY DON'T TELL YOU
beats.narration: Now for the part the registration page leaves out.
beats.visual: Red flag overlay — weaknesses with warning icons

broll_sources.query: THE EQUALIZER - Missouri State Championship course preview
gravel cycling Rolling Missouri wine country gravel

beats.editing_note: BURST SEQUENCE at 0:50 transition (pattern interrupt). 5-10 quick cuts: meme reaction, avatar facepalm, red overlay flash, warning sound. Then settle into analysis. Each weakness gets its own visual card + avatar reaction.

weaknesses: Brutal July heat—90-95°F + humidity = heat exhaustion risk
Small field (200-300 riders) = less energy than big events
Course is rolling but not extreme—challenge is heat, not terrain
Limited lodging in Marthasville—need to drive from St. Charles

beats.label: THE NUMBERS DON'T LIE
beats.narration: Let the numbers do the talking. Altitude. 1 out of 5. Sea level. Your lungs get a day off. Marthasville sits in the Missouri River Valley at basically sea level with zero altitude considerations. Technicality. 2 out of 5. Your road bike might survive. Might. Surface variety ranges from fast hard-packed crushed limestone to loose gravel to big brown Charette Creek river valley rock. Climate. 2 out of 5. Mild conditions. Nothing dramatic. Late July in Missouri delivered 90-98°F temperatures in 2023 causing 20% DNF, with 2024 slightly better at 85-95°F but still producing 15% heat casualties.
beats.visual: Score cards — lowest 3 dimensions with explanations
beats.editing_note: RE-ENGAGEMENT BEAT — this is the ~2 min mark. Start with the least bad score, escalate to worst. Each score reveal: brief silence (0.5s), then number slams in. Avatar reaction scales with how bad the score is. Von Restorff: visually isolate the worst score (different color, bigger text, longer hold). [RIFF HERE] after the worst score reveal.

beats.label: THE BOTTOM LINE
beats.narration: If you want a legitimate suffer fest from terrain, look elsewhere. If you want to test heat survival and hydration management. THE EQUALIZER delivers. Come in July shape, hydrate obsessively, and start early. The wine country scenery is nice, but you'll be too hot to care. The state championship jersey is a nice bonus if you podium. Otherwise, this is a regional heat test, not a bucket-list race.
beats.editing_note: PAYOFF. Close the open loop from the hook. Avatar delivers final take directly to camera. End ABRUPTLY — never signal 'we're wrapping up.' MrBeast rule: cut to CTA mid-energy.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown. All 14 dimensions. Free prep kit. Link in bio.
beats.editing_note: Keep energy up. Don't wind down.
beats.engagement_question: Roast or defend THE EQUALIZER - Missouri State Championship. Go.

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style flat cutout character, dramatic reveal pose, tier badge prominent, 'THE EQUALIZER - Missouri State Championship' bold text, tier badge 'ELITE', high contrast red/yellow/white, cycling gear, handlebar mustache --ar 16:9 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.youtube: Primary platform. Enable mid-roll ads if >8 min.
cross_platform_notes.extract_shorts: Pull 3-5 Short clips from hot take moments within 48hrs.
cross_platform_notes.twitter_x: Post the most controversial data point as a standalone take.
